rules_text:
This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When this creature enters, create half X tapped colorless Desert land tokens with “{T}: Add {C}”, rounded down.
Retrofit–{GW}, Tap X untapped lands and/or other creatures you control. [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
